prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a rugged appearance and a cheerful expression.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a boulder but has arms and a friendly smile.
Generate a Pokemon with a tough exterior, showcasing its rocky texture and determination.
Make a unique Pokemon that embodies the strength of mountains and the spirit of adventure.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into rocky terrains while remaining friendly and approachable.
Design a Pokemon that is both sturdy and playful, with a body made of stone.
Give me a Pokemon that represents endurance, featuring a muscular build and a rocky surface.
